paragraphs.content: The Parties intend to {{ purpose }} (the "**Permitted Purpose**").

In connection with the Permitted Purpose, one or more of the Parties (in such capacity, the "**Disclosing Party**") has disclosed or made available, and may (further) disclose or make available, certain confidential and/or proprietary business, financial, technical, or other information to one or more other Parties (in such capacity, the "**Receiving Party**") that the Disclosing Party desires the Receiving Party to treat as confidential.
This mutual non-disclosure agreement (the "**Agreement**") sets out the terms and conditions under which such information is shared and protected among the Parties.
